Package de.coreengine.system

Class Scene

java.lang.Object
de.coreengine.system.Scene
public class Scene
extends Object
Class that represent a scene/level in the game
Author:
Darius Dinger

    • getPhysicWorld

      public com.bulletphysics.dynamics.DynamicsWorld getPhysicWorld()
